message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to be selling this product which I believe will be very valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This product truly offers exceptional value.
I appreciate your understanding of my budget constraints, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
